sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the War on Terrorism Compensation Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the War on Terrorism Compensation Act.

sections.heading: Assignment prohibited. No right or claim to compensation under this Act may be assigned.
sections.text: Assignment prohibited. No right or claim to compensation under this Act may be assigned.

sections.heading: Legal disability. If a person to whom compensation is payable under this Act is under a legal disability, the compensation shall be paid to the person legally vested with the care of the person under a legal disability under the laws of his or her state of residence
sections.text: If no such person has been so de

sections.heading: Application to Department of Veterans' Affairs. An application for compensation under this Act must be made to the Department.
sections.text: Application to Department of Veterans' Affairs. An application for compensation under this Act must be made to the Department.

sections.heading: Rules. The Department shall adopt rules for making payments under this Act, for ascertaining and selecting proper beneficiaries and determining the amount to which those beneficiaries are entitled, and for procedures necessary for implementing this Act
sections.text: Rules. The Department shall adopt rules for making payments under this Act, for ascertaining and selecting proper beneficiaries and determining the amount to which those beneficiaries are entitled, and for procedures necessary for implementing this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
